name: Candle stick
description: A Candlestick covered in blood

name: Knife
description: A small knife covered in blood

name: Broken Pipe
description: A hefty piece of broken plumbing covered in blood

name: Revolver
description: A gun with an empty clip

name: Umbrella
description: An umbrella with a spiked end covered in blood

name: Fire Extinguisher
description: A fire extinguisher covered in blood at one end

name: Corkscrew
description: A corkscrew covered in blood

name: The Bad Business Venture
description:
Colin i don't think our joint business venture will work out. 
  You bring nothing to the table. Im gonna go it alone from now on.
Sorry things didn't work out.
Hope I can still come to you for advise from time to time.

name: The Actors Complaint
description:
Diana, I simply cannot take part in your play anymore. 
 You are a slave driver and you have nothing but complaints for me.
I can't take it anymore and I know it's only a couple of weeks until
the performance, but i QUIT!!!

name: The fantasy obsession
description:
Lilly, I don't think what you're asking for is safe.
We simply can't go through with it. Larping with foam swords is one thing but using real weapons?!?
That's the same as trying to kill someone for real. It's just not right.
I'm sorry, but I'm out

name: The Old English Rose
description:
Marry, I managed to do what you asked i sneaked in a weapon and hid it you know where. 
 I'm not sure we should go through with this though, i mean sure a pretend 
 murder mystery sounds fun but someone could really get hurt.

name: The scientists art
description:
Mike, I don't mind helping out with you experiment, but I just need to know what it is first
and why do I need to make sure I haven't eaten?
This won't be dangerous will it?

name: The Murdering Archaeologist
description:
Hey Will, I found something amazing right here on campus.
I am amazed no one else has found it before. There's a cave right under the campus.
I read up on some old legend about the area and I think this could really make us rich.
I'll tell you where it is at the party when I see you there.
Keep this between us though, okay?

name: The Homicidal Student
description:
David, you are slacking in you're studies again. I will talk to you at the party about it.
However, I'm sorry to say that I will need to submit a form to request that you will either
be expelled for lack of work or retake the year.

name: The Insane Decorator
description:
Look, Julie, I changed the party decoration order last minute. Why on earth did you have so many red decorations?
Literally all the decorations were red that would have looked terrible. Sorry, I hope that this doesn't upset you
too much. I know how you can get a little crazy with these kinds of things. Anyway see you at the party!

name: The Pirates Life
description:
Sophie, I know you've worked hard all year, but I simply cannot go back on my decision to promote the newbie and not you
I'm sorry, but he is the manager's kid I have no choice. No hard feelings. See you at the party.

name: The Red Ink
description: Look, Tom, I know it's tough when you have a lot of papers to mark but the university simply doesn't have the time. You've missed too many deadlines on your research and on markings so I'm sorry, but I have to let you go.

name: Bag
description: A bag. Someone must have left in a hurry.

name: Earbuds
description: Earbuds. Someone must have dropped them.

name: Wallet
description: A Wallet. The wallet is pretty empty apart from a picture of a beach somewhere.

name: Keys
description: Some Keys. Someone must have lost these.

name: Lighter
description: A very fancy looking lighter, I wish it was mine.

name: Lipstick
description: Lipstick, a killers best friend.

name: Bus Ticket
description: A bus ticket, looks like its for tonight.

name: Notebook
description: A notebook, looks like some of the pages are torn out.

name: Mirror
description: A hand mirror. It looks rather old.

name: Sunglasses
description: Sunglasses, I guess someone was trying to look cool.

name: Watch
description: A watch. I wonder who's it could be it appears to be broken though.

name: Comic Book
description: A Comic Book. I used to love this series i wonder if I can keep this once this is over, probably not

name: Key Chain
description: A broken key chain, looks like someone threw it away.

name: Fantasy Book
description: A Parry Hooter Book. What a weird name for the main character.

name: Old mp3 player
description: An mp3 player that looks about 10 years old.

name: Small Camera
description: A small camera. I guess they didn't get to use this in the end the films missing.

name: A burnt picture
description: A picture of the victim but half the picture has been burnt away.

name: Tarot cards
description: Some Tarot cards. I hope my fortune isn't the same as our victim

name: Leather checkbook
description: A Leather Bound Checkbook. Someone must have lost this but it looks pretty new.

name: Perfume Bottle
description: An bottle of expensive perfume. It looks about half empty.

name: Secret Door
description: The bookcase has a fake book. Pull it?

name: Trainers
description: A pair of trainers that look very comfy
